Articles.Content: I'm a Kerbal newbie (about 1/100 as awesome as Jeb) and would like some general advice. Thanks! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Welcome aboard! If you want advice you may want to check out the [Tutorials.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials)

Oh and open the pod bay doors will you?
Welcome aboard as well! Like Yukon there above me said, one of the best places to go is the Tutorials subforum. They'll answer any questions you have and provide advice on everything.

Welcome to the forums!

There's the tutorials section, as mentioned. If you have a specific question, you can check in the [Gameplay Questions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials) section to see if it's been answered, and ask it yourself if not. You should also check out [the wiki](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Main_Page) which contains a wealth of information.

Happy landings!
Um, hi. I hope you accomplish great things here, and if you need anything just post in the tutorials forum.

as they say on Kerbin, "This isn't orbit! This is falling with style!" (Or in Toy Story. I forget which.)

Welcome!

> 
> Welcome aboard! If you want advice you may want to check out the [Tutorials.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials)
> Oh and open the pod bay doors will you?

What you did; I saw it there.
